talksYaml.title: Behind the Scenes of Spell Checks!
talksYaml.description: Ever missed rectifying a spelling mistake in an important email but were super relieved that it got auto-corrected? Let’s understand what happens under the hood. This talk introduces the algorithm behind handling typos, the various Natural Language Processing techniques available and how you can tweak them for your use-case!

speakers.name: Niharika Krishnan
speakers.biography: Niharika Krishnan currently works as a Machine Learning Engineer in India where she builds NLP based solutions for TCS - Walmart. She leads the PyLadies Chennai chapter and has been a tech-speaker at PyCon India’19, PyCon Canada’19 & Google Women Techmakers conferences. She has a passion for AI and believes in leveraging technology to help people lead better lives!
